text:
State Service (Restructuring) Order 2010

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

12 July 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Acting Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order 2010 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 21 July 2010.

3. Amalgamation
    The Tasmanian Community Fund Secretariat, part of the Department of Treasury and Finance, is amalgamated with the Department of Premier and Cabinet.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 July 2010

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
